body:
*Description*:
When a UDP listener is configured with envoy running with two or more workers, one worker is able to create the listener socket but other workers segfault. No traffic is needed, the segfault happens soon after startup. 

Envoy should not crash and multiple workers should be able to receive UDP requests.

*Repro steps*:
Run envoy (latest as of f7de5eb) with a UDP listener configured using more than one worker.

`./envoy -c test-config.yaml --concurrency 2 --log-level trace`

*Config*:
 Config file is identical to the [example configuration for the UDP proxy filter](https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/configuration/listeners/udp_filters/udp_proxy#example-configuration).

```
access_log_path: /tmp/admin_access.log
  address:
    socket_address:
      protocol: TCP
      address: 127.0.0.1
      port_value: 9901
static_resources:
  listeners:
  - name: listener_0
    address:
      socket_address:
        protocol: UDP
        address: 127.0.0.1
        port_value: 1234
    listener_filters:
      name: envoy.filters.udp_listener.udp_proxy
      typed_config:
        '@type': type.googleapis.com/envoy.config.filter.udp.udp_proxy.v2alpha.UdpProxyConfig
        stat_prefix: service
        cluster: service_udp
  clusters:
  - name: service_udp
    connect_timeout: 0.25s
    type: STATIC
    lb_policy: ROUND_ROBIN
    load_assignment:
      cluster_name: service_udp
      endpoints:
      - lb_endpoints:
        - endpoint:
            address:
              socket_address:
                address: 127.0.0.1
                port_value: 1235
```

*Logs*:
[envoy.log](https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/files/4206164/envoy.log)

*Call Stack*:
```
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.929][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:83] Caught Aborted, suspect faulting address 0x3e800007c8a
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.929][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:70] Backtrace (use tools/stack_decode.py to get line numbers):
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.929][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:71] Envoy version: f7de5ebdb2459250f4fde233bc0c73d5c5336967/1.14.0-dev/Clean/RELEASE/BoringSSL
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.929][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #0: __restore_rt [0x7f3dccbe8540]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:77] #1: [0x55caa87270c9]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #2: std::__terminate() [0x55caa8c8a083]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #3: Envoy::Network::NetworkListenSocket<>::NetworkListenSocket() [0x55caa822a166]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #4: Envoy::Server::ProdListenerComponentFactory::createListenSocket() [0x55caa821f545]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #5: Envoy::Server::ListenSocketFactoryImpl::createListenSocketAndApplyOptions() [0x55caa8216f59]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #6: Envoy::Server::ListenSocketFactoryImpl::getListenSocket() [0x55caa8217488]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #7: Envoy::Server::ActiveUdpListener::ActiveUdpListener() [0x55caa826c816]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #8: Envoy::Server::ActiveRawUdpListenerFactory::createActiveUdpListener() [0x55caa8211578]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #9: Envoy::Server::ConnectionHandlerImpl::addListener() [0x55caa8269bee]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #10: std::__1::__function::__func<>::operator()() [0x55caa82693af]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #11: Envoy::Event::DispatcherImpl::runPostCallbacks() [0x55caa8271e16]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #12: Envoy::Event::DispatcherImpl::run() [0x55caa8271cac]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #13: Envoy::Server::WorkerImpl::threadRoutine() [0x55caa8268b08]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #14: Envoy::Thread::ThreadImplPosix::ThreadImplPosix()::$_0::__invoke() [0x55caa875c9f3]
[2020-02-14 10:57:35.935][31893][critical][backtrace] [bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/source/server/_virtual_includes/backtrace_lib/server/backtrace.h:75] #15: start_thread [0x7f3dccbdc669]
```
title: Segfault when configuring UDP listener using 2+ workers
